entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:47 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
